Edhy Prabowo dan Ketua Komisi IV Debat Soal Target Kinerja KKP
06 Nov 2019, 10:39 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Danang Sugianto

Jakarta - Menteri Kelautan dan Perikanan Edhy Prabowo hari ini menghadiri rapat kerja perdana dengan Komisi IV DPR RI. Dalam rapat ini Edhy diminta untuk menjelaskan rencana kerja jangka pendek dan panjang.Edhy pun mulai menjelaskan dari sisi target pertumbuhan PDB perikanan. Pada 2020 ditargetkan 7,9%, 2021 menjadi 8,11%, 2022 ke 8,31%, 2023 naik ke 8,51%, dan 2024 menjadi 8,71%."Target indikator ini salah satunya meliputi PDB perikanan," ujarnya di ruang rapat Komisi IV, Gedung DPR RI, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Saat menjelaskan, tiba-tiba Edhy disela oleh Ketua Komisi IV DPR RI Sudin. Dia menyela dan mempertanyakan tentang target perikanan tangkap yang dicanangkan 8,02 juta ton pada 2020."Ini angkanya dari mana Pak Menteri, jangan-jangan hanya copas saja," ujarnya.Edhy pun menjawab, meski dia belum mendalami target-target tersebut, namun dia yakin bahwa target produksi ikan dari perikanan tangkap yang mencapai 8,02 juta ton merupakan angka yang realistis.Dia yakin target itu bisa tercapai asalkan perizinan untuk kapal tangkap bisa dimudahkan. Kemudahan izin kapal tangkap ikan beberapa hari ini menjadi janji yang diutarakan oleh Edhy."Target 8,02 juta ton saya pribadi menurut saya sangat kecil. Masalah utama KKP itu mensimultankan antar sektor. Karena saya yakin izin kapal ini dipermudah dengan tentunya tidak merusak pertumbuhan ikan di laut, saya yakin angka 8,02 juta ton ini bukan angka yang muluk," tegasnya.Pada 2020, KKP sendiri menargetkan produksi perikanan nasional mencapai 26,46 juta ton. Terdiri dari target perikanan tangkap 8,02 juta ton dan perikanan budi daya 18,44 juta ton. Simak Video "Menteri KKP Blusukan Perdana ke Muara Angke"[Gambas:Video 20detik](das/ara)

Edhy Prabowo and Chair of Commission IV Debate on the KKP Performance Targets
Nov 6, 2019, 10:39 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Danang Sugianto

Jakarta - Minister of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries Edhy Prabowo today attended the inaugural working meeting with the Commission IV of the Indonesian Parliament. In this meeting Edhy was asked to explain short and long term work plans. Edhy also began to explain in terms of fisheries GDP growth targets. In 2020, it is targeted to reach 7.9%, 2021 to 8.11%, 2022 to 8.31%, 2023 to 8.51%, and 2024 to 8.71%. "One of the targets for this indicator is fisheries GDP," he said. in the Commission IV meeting room, RI Parliament Building, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). While explaining, Edhy was suddenly interrupted by the Chair of Commission IV of the Indonesian Parliament Sudin. He interrupted and questioned about the capture fisheries target that was set up 8.02 million tons in 2020. "This is the number from where the Minister, lest only copas," he said. he believes that the target of fish production from capture fisheries reaching 8.02 million tons is a realistic figure. He believes that the target can be achieved as long as permits for fishing vessels can be facilitated. The ease of fishing vessel permits in recent days has become a promise expressed by Edhy. "I personally think that the 8.02 million ton target is very small. The main problem of the KKP is that it is inter-sectoral. at sea, I believe the 8.02 million tons figure is not a grandiose figure, "he stressed. In 2020, KKP itself targets national fisheries production to reach 26.46 million tons. Consists of a target of 8.02 million tons of fisheries and 18.44 million tons of aquaculture.
